title: Patch 5.3 Bugs Megathread
body:
Good day Summoners,

We are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate.

Also, you may want to check reddit as well: http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2vjbft/53_patch_bugs_megathread/

Thank you

replies.body:
I have this really annoying bug..

I just got home from holiday, and just updated game and stuff..
I then procces to go in Solo Q and enter champion selection and choose champion and everything.

Then when the game is supposed to go into loading screen, my game minimize.. The game has started and i can hear the ingame music and people spawning/killing each other.. But i cannot open the game.. When i click on the minimized button on my Task line, i just minimize right away again.. 


So basically.. The game is running, but it stays minimized no matter how many times i click to open it up.. Tryed to renew ip, run as admin, nothing worked.. Is this something you're familiar with?? Kinda annoying i just had to miss my first game after vaccation because of this :/
